rating_comment: I have been traveling to Dhaka sce last 16 yrs...but this stay was first of its kind. It was a nice nd peaceful stay. Good for single person. ...all amenities were available. Centrally located in the heart of the city. will recomned to stay in this property. The gaurd cum caretaker was quite good.

I have stayed at this property from 24th August to 27th August 2023
My host, Mr. Nasir has excellent communication skills and responsiveness. He is very prompt in addressing any questions at the time of booking and during my stay.
Host behaviour made me feel welcoming and comfortable, also flat caretaker is very helpful.
It shows their dedication to ensuring their guests have a great experience
Mr. Nasir maintained a clean and well-maintained space, it demonstrates their attention to detail and commitment to providing a pleasant stay. Location of the flat is most convenient for anyone.
My overall experience is wonderful & I will recommend this place to others because it's a safe place for staying.
Best wishes for Mr. Nasir

I had a great stay at Nasir’s apartment in Hatirpool. He and the caretaker were extremely helpful and generous with their time in getting me settled. They had lots of tips for the bustling local area too. The apartment was very clean and comfortable with a fully functional kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. I also like the rooftop area on the top floor of the building. Recommend to anyone who wants to stay in a lively and central area in Dhaka city.
